Automate workflows and enable your sales team with digital marketing insight that plugs directly into the Chrome browser.

The Insites SEO audit is a powerful sales tool, automating quality checks for any business website across a number of metrics, including broken links, loading speed, spelling errors and much more.

Run an Insites SEO audit on your business website directly from the browser extension. You can view the results at a glance, and click through directly to the report.

The Chrome extension also allows you to see directly where issues were detected during the audit, by highlighting the exact position on the webpage.
